Html:
Well it is not a problem with the tool, but I have a problem using the tool properly. :) After building, I run the project but I have no camera image in the application form but instead bar code like colored vertical lines. My camera's working indicator light is also dim.

Does any of you have a solution for me? :)

 

thank you,

Noah

If you camera's light is dim, that means the program is not using your camera. Try other cameraID in your camera initialization code.

Ohan
